posts.post_content: I believe you folks are forgetting that [Entreat the Angels](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Entreat the Angels) is also in Standard. There is also much more potential for this card in Modern as well. I'm thinking a W/B build with [Godless Shrine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Godless Shrine) and[Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth) (did any of you see the giant spike in the price of that card?). The plan would be to stall for as long as possible to get Lili to ultimate by turn 7, then, if you're lucky, miracle [Entreat the Angels](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Entreat the Angels) for at least 20. a 5/5 in my books any day.

posts.post_content: Her ultimate doesn't feel very ultimate to me. Sure, you've got a metric ton of b, but what are you going to do with it? At the very least, by the time you can pull off that ultimate, you're going to have at least 5 swamps out (2 you used to cast her, and 3 more you fetched with her), and probably a lot more than that. If 2bbbbb isn't enough to win, is 2bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbreally going to do it?

posts.post_content: So incredible in my mono black control. Makes sure I hit Swamp drops to power mutilates and the like, pumps creatures massively for finishers which can instead be used as removal. While the ultimate seems crazy, it's really only good with cards like [Consume Spirit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Consume Spirit), and the other abilities, especially the -3, are too good to ultimate most of the time.

posts.post_content: She is a beast in a **[Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon)** EDH deck. posts.post_content:
EDIT: My opinion of this card has changed sooooo much.  
  
In my Evil EDH deck I probably won't ever actually buy with [Maralen of the Mornsong](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Maralen of the Mornsong) as the cornerstone, this is the second card I search for, after [Aven Mindcensor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aven Mindcensor). Each turn I would never want to waste 3 life on just FINIDING a land, but now I can get a Swamp for FREE. And then if I get to the Ultimate, I usually play [Storm Herd](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Storm Herd), and [Elesh Norn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elesh Norn) and others help me win. Also, [Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth) lets me run more non-basics :)  
  
  
Also, @ Ike38: Yeah. The "Swamp" clauses refer to cards with the type "Swamp."
